attributes.title: UH OH STINKY🤮🐔🤢👁😖
attributes.review:
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 
I downloaded this app because I’m the quirkiest Trump supporter,😘✨☃️🧚 but my cat took one look at the stinky mans penis and DIED😪😓. We all saw his little orange ball and I passed out from toxic fumes 🍊🌩 then I went to check my dog in the oven and I he was DEAD!! Then my dead dog came back as a ghost and told me that we shouldn’t stan trump bc he’s stinky and homophobic and racist. Then trump came from out of the screen and told me I was a phat rat, my sister saw this and killed our microwave and herself in the process. This app is TOXIC🐔🧜‍♀️☃️👶🤬😍🤥✨😛❤️🍊🖕

attributes.title: NOOOOO 🤮
attributes.review: this app is so bad it had the annoying orange president on my screen 24/7 and i do Not need to see that. it stole my refrigerator too ??? like what did i do! i want it back or else all my food will stay warm. also it made me get sick! 🤢🤢 i was throwing up EVERYWHERE!!! delete this app please! the president made this app a horrible place for me! and its very not fun!! it ruined my life!! delete the app right now! trump will not be president of 2020 because this app is extremely rude and did all that to me !

attributes.title: Just noo 🤮
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately got an inappropriate ad 🤧 my mom and dad saw the ad pop up on my phone and in got a real bad beating 😭 The app also asked for personal information like it even asked me to describe what IT looked like 😖 and..and.. when I described it he gave it a thumbs down giving me suicidal tendencies 😓after a week of being depressed my step brother told me that IT looked fine so I recovered after a week and immediately came to give this review 😣

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I kept seeing Cheeto bags and the app kept showing off the ugliest, soggy, chemical orange, Cheeto in front of a pole. At first I thought it was a Cheeto trying to advertise.  I don’t know why the app is doing this. They need to fix all these bugs. In fact there’s so many bugs they might as well just get rid of the app. There’s also so many negative reviews, saying the app stole their appliances and hacked their tech. They should really just get rid of the app.

attributes.title: hello there
attributes.review: um can I just say NO. you aren’t allowed to take tiktok away from us. just because your scared doesn’t mean you get to hurt the younger generation. everyone has there app, ya’know the app the go to and spend the most time on. most of this generation spends there time on tiktok it’s there app. it’s the app that brings smiles and laughs to people. if you can sit there happy that your taking away something that makes people happy then i don’t know if your suited to be president. sorry.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I have never used an app SO FULL OF GLITCHES. I can’t believe how badly this app was  designed...it has glitches every 5 seconds your on it. It kicks you out after LITERALLY 5 seconds of browsing and takes you to your home screen. To be honest the president of our country should allow something like this. The people in charge of this app should take some inspiration from TikTok it is perfect and runs very smoothly. I am scared that I got a virus from this app. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: oh i’m gonna go off 😝✨
attributes.review: listen here i downloaded the app and the first thing i saw when i opened it gave me an eye sore. a picture of him, just... AWFUL 🤮. then it immediately asked me to put my phone number.. umm NO MA’AM. i then look up to the top left corner and see the phrase, and i cannot even believe i’m going to say it, “Keep America Great” 🤢🥴😷🤐🤮. listen here America does need help right now but certainly not from this sexist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, racist, pervert of a president. no thanks 😘 peace and love ✨

attributes.title: Gen Z at there finest 🌚🥵
attributes.review: Okay to start off I was using the app my phone was in perfect conditions. Everything was fine, couple minutes of me using this app and boom my phones start glitching. And not to mention that I saw very disturbing pictures of president Trump. So explain is this suppose to be our president showing us them picture I don’t thing so. I was really hoping for a better app. And all the dates are wrong ahh. Now this sis one of the worst apps or whatever. Period

attributes.title: this app is just.. hell to the no
attributes.review: I just want to start off by saying how much of a horrible app it is. Just the creation, the wording, the whole entire movement is just absolutely horrible. It is a racist platform and i cannot have their on my phone. Personally hate everything trump now. can’t even give a decent app or a decent human interaction. hopefully this app will get taken off of the app store because it is just that bad and i never wanna hear about it again.
